institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: Skill Competition Management Rules/Article 7 (City/Provincial Committee Duties)
contents: Article 7 (Duties of City/Provincial Committees) City/Provincial Committees shall, in principle, perform their duties within the scope of the ordinances or entrusted authority set by the relevant city/province, and shall carry out the following projects: 1. Matters relating to holding local competitions, 2. Matters relating to participation in and support for holding national competitions, 3. Matters relating to support for nurturing local skilled technicians, 4. Matters relating to follow-up management, such as employment promotion for winners of local skills competitions, 5. Other matters related to the execution of affairs entrusted by the relevant city/province
